info.document:
(EMAILWIRE.COM, September 16, 2017 ) The Europe Organic Seeds Market was worth USD 350 million in 2016 and estimated to be growing at a CAGR of 11.5%, to reach USD 613 million by 2021. With the increasing popularity for organic food and organic farming, and increasing environmental awareness regarding the use of chemical fertilizers and pesticides, the need for Organic Seeds is increasing which enhances the growth of this market in the aforementioned forecast period.

Browse Full Report @ http://www.marketdataforecast.com/market-reports/europe-organic-seeds-market-2851/

Non-synthetic food products have better taste, higher antioxidant characteristics and more nutritional value. They are produced by organic farming. It is an alternative farming technique that does not involve harmful pesticides and uses fertilizers of organic origin and it emphasizes on farming techniques like crop rotation.

Download Free Sample Report @ http://www.marketdataforecast.com/market-reports/europe-organic-seeds-market-2851/request-sample

Factors like growing awareness regarding the negative health impact caused by utilizing chemicals in agriculture, increasing demand for non-synthetic products in Food and Beverage industry, growing environmental concerns over conventional agricultural practices and favourable regulatory frameworks pertaining to organic farming in developed regions are driving the market forward. Yet, expensive prices of organic seeds and supply-demand woes are likely to hamper the growth of market. Also, initiatives taken by government and agencies related to agriculture hold great future potential for market.

The Europe market for Organic seeds is segmented based on crop type, application and distribution channels. Based on crop type - Field-crop Seeds, Vegetable Seeds, Fruit and Nut Seeds and Other vegetation. Based on Application - Agriculture, Horticulture and Other Practices. Based on Distribution Channels - Wholesalers, Retailers and Cooperatives. Based on Geographical analysis the market is separated into regions of U.K., Germany, France, Italy and Spain. Germany is leading the market. Higher adoption rate and favourable government regulations favoured the dominance of Germany. Crop wise Vegetable Seeds are leading the market by a small margin over Fruit and Nut Seeds due to ever increasing need to increased food production and growing population.

Some of the key players dominating this market include Seeds of Change, Johnny's Selected Seeds, Fedco Seeds, High Mowing Organic Seeds, Seed Savers Exchange, Wild Garden Seeds, HILD Samen, Fleuren, Vitalis Organic Seeds, Navdanya, De Bolster, Maas Plant, Southern Exposure Seed Exchange and Arnica Kwekerij.
